title: No mastery 6 tokens
body: I have mastery 5 with both Evelyn and Rammus. I have since achieved at least one S- or S ranks with each, but have not received any mastery tokens. My most recent game was an ARAM where I got an S rank with Rammus, who has definitely been mastery 5 for some time now. It told me I'd received an S in the end of game screen, but no token. I checked Hextech, but to no avail, I did not receive my hard-earned mastery tokens. At least one of these champs, if not both, should be at 6 by now.

replies.body: Looking into this for you, I do see that these games were played in ARAM.  Per our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide, tokens are currently only available in Summoner's Rift.  It will be necessary to play in those modes.  Hopefully that helps clear things up, and best of luck!
That would explain it. Although looking through that link, I still don't find anywhere that it actually says this.
Sorry about that, I linked to the wrong article.  Here is the[ champion mastery ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide)guide!

OK, that does cover it. I did have a look around before posting, but must have missed that bit.

Thanks for the help!
